channel.title: Pressing object sets new coords
channel.description:
The thing I want to know how to make you tele to another coord by pressing on a portal.. Where can I change the coords when players press on portals.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2gwdz6h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/5be89e.jpg[/img]

item.title: Pressing object sets new coords
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:4, topic:365138”]Well, I’m going to assume this is Delta, so under the portal you are clicking find the object ID and add something like

triggerTele(####, ####, 0);[/quote]
what he said, to find your coordinates (the place you want to portal the teleport you too) do ::mypos, if this is delta, and if it is and you dont have that command, here it is:

} if (command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 2) { sM("AbsX: " + absX + " AbsY: " + absY + "");
pretty simple command, hope we helped :o

Read full topic

item.title: Pressing object sets new coords

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

do you mean like if they click on it, they teleport to a certain area, how do i change the coordinates? well if thats what you mean, first i need to know what base your using, if its delta, i can help you

item.title: Pressing object sets new coords
item.dc:creator: @dillktm65 dillktm65
item.description:
@dillktm65 wrote:

First , of all you wanna find the coords.
Walk on top of by Typing ::Noclip wich lets go threw any object.

Then Do ::mypos Wich Gives cords, then go to client.java And search one shoudl look something like this

if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3507) {
triggerTele(2602, 4772, 0);
sM(“You have teleported To”);
}

The Trigger Tele is The X And Y Coords Type Then Then a Slogan for your teleport.

Read full topic
